title: Logitech Unifying USB Receiver for Performance Mouse MX
description: Logitech Unifying receiver for mouse and keyboard Logitech Unifying receiver (M/N:C-U0007) Will work with any product that display the Unifying Logo The unifying receiver working with 7 mice and keyboards in the same time. Compatible with: Logitech wireless mouse M505 Marathon Mouse M705 Logitech Mouse M905 Logitech keyboard K340 Logitech keyboard K350 Wireless Number Pad N305 Logitech Wireless Desktop MK710 Logitech Wireless Keyboard K320 Logitech Notebook Kit MK605 Logitech mouse M215
